entry.title: The Book Thief
entry.summary: This is the story about the one and only book thief I've met

div.p: Around 2003 I began the political foot work to establish the Ediffah project, which was meant to establish an union catalog for archival collections at the larger Swedish research libraries. As usual when you're up to something like that you have to talk to and visit the right people.

One of the right people, in this case, was the Head of Manuscript and Rare books collections at the National Library of Sweden. Let's call him John, since that is what he is called in the TV series coming up on Swedish National Television tonight.
